Description
===========
  CaptureSound illustrates how to capture a wave file using DirectSound.

Path
====
  Source: Mssdk\Samples\Multimedia\DSound\Src\CaptureSound

  Executable: Mssdk\Samples\Multimedia\DSound\Bin

User's Guide
============
  First select a file name.  Then press 'Record' to start the recording, and 
  'Record' again to stop the recording.

Programming Notes
=================
  This sample was intended to be very simple, showing the basics of capturing a
  sound using the DirectSound API.
